results.title: Protective Effects of Simvastatin on Endotoxin-Induced Acute Kidney Injury through Activation of Tubular Epithelial Cells' Survival and Hindering Cytochrome C-Mediated Apoptosis
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/kg most profoundly attenuated tubular @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@, determined as a decrease of @GENE_CYCS @GENE_54205 @@@cytochrome C@@@, @GENE_CASP3 @GENE_836 @@@caspase-3@@@ expression, and AIs (p  <  0.01 vs.

results.title: Attenuation of estrogen and its receptors in the post-menopausal stage exacerbates dyslipidemia and leads to cognitive impairment
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Estradiol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004958 @@@beta-estradiol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ effectively attenuated @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@ via upregulation of ERs, whereas @GENE_ESR1 @GENE_13982 @@@ERalpha@@@, @GENE_ESR2 @GENE_2100 @@@ERbeta@@@ and @GENE_GPER1 @GENE_2852 @@@GPER@@@ inhibitors together abolished the protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Meng Q, Chao Y, Zhang S, Ding X, Feng H, Zhang C, Liu B, Zhu W, Li Y, Zhang Q, Tong H, Wu L, Bian H. Attenuation of estrogen and its receptors in the post-menopausal stage exacerbates dyslipidemia and leads to cognitive impairment Mol Brain. 2023 Nov 20;16(1):80. PMID: 37986006

results.title: Exenatide Attenuates Obesity-Induced Mitochondrial Dysfunction by Activating SIRT1 in Renal Tubular Cells
results.text_hl: Collectively, these findings show that @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@exenatide@@@ was superior to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@-@DISEASE_Diarrhea_5_With_Tufting_Enteropathy_Congenital @DISEASE_MESH:C567703 @@@TECs injuries@@@, the mechanism is partially through @GENE_SIRT1 @GENE_23411 @@@SIRT1@@@ restoration, which directly reverses @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang Y, He W, Wei W, Mei X, Yang M, Wang Y. Exenatide Attenuates Obesity-Induced Mitochondrial Dysfunction by Activating SIRT1 in Renal Tubular Cells Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2021;12():622737. PMID: 34434166

results.title: Modulation of the Nitric Oxide/BH4 Pathway Protects Against Irradiation-Induced Neuronal Damage.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Sildenafil_Citrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068677 @@@Sildenafil@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Sildenafil_Citrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068677 @@@SD@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@) were reported to have antioxidant/anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects and to serve as NO donor/@CHEMICAL_sapropterin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C003402 @@@BH4@@@ regulator, respectively.

citations.NLM: Thabet NM, Rashed ER, Abdel-Rafei MK, Moustafa EM. Modulation of the Nitric Oxide/BH4 Pathway Protects Against Irradiation-Induced Neuronal Damage. Neurochem Res. 2021 Jul;46(7):1641-1658. PMID: 33755856

results.title: Synergism of simvastatin with losartan prevents angiotensin II-induced cardiomyocyte apoptosis in vitro.
results.text_hl: Synergism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ prevents @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@cardiomyocyte apoptosis@@@ in vitro.

citations.NLM: Xu J, Lü XW, Huang Y, Zhu PL, Li J. Synergism of simvastatin with losartan prevents angiotensin II-induced cardiomyocyte apoptosis in vitro. J Pharm Pharmacol. 2009 Apr;61(4):503-10. PMID: 19298698

results.title: The effects of simvastatin on hippocampal caspase-3 and Bcl-2 expression             following kainate-induced seizures in rats.
results.text_hl: Feeding of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for 3 days after @CHEMICAL_Kainic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007608 @@@kainate@@@ injection rescued @DISEASE_Status_Epilepticus @DISEASE_MESH:D013226 @@@SE@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@, as determined by histological examination of brain sections at the level of the dorsal hippocampus.

citations.NLM: Sun J, Xie C, Liu W, Lu D, Qiao W, Huang Q, Huo Z, Shen H, Lin Z. The effects of simvastatin on hippocampal caspase-3 and Bcl-2 expression             following kainate-induced seizures in rats. Int J Mol Med. 2012 Oct;30(4):739-46. PMID: 22842798

results.title: Insulin prevents and reverts simvastatin-induced toxicity in C2C12 skeletal muscle cells
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ could prevent the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ signaling pathway and on @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@, but not on the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) stress induction.

citations.NLM: Sanvee GM, Bouitbir J, Krähenbühl S. Insulin prevents and reverts simvastatin-induced toxicity in C2C12 skeletal muscle cells Sci Rep. 2019 May 15;9(1):7409. PMID: 31092879

results.title: Simvastatin Therapy in the Acute Stage of Traumatic Brain Injury Attenuates Brain Trauma-Induced Depression-Like Behavior in Rats by Reducing Neuroinflammation in the Hippocampus.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@, microglia and astrocyte activation, and @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ expression in the microglia and astrocytes of the CA3 area of the hippocampus were significantly reduced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment, particularly when 20 mg/kg was administered for 3 days.

results.title: Reduced apoptosis after acute myocardial infarction by simvastatin.
results.text_hl: To observe the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@acute myocardial infarction@@@ in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@myocardial apoptosis@@@, and to explore its possible mechanism.
